item.title: Rachmaninoff Had a Dog
item.description: As one who adores the larger canine breeds, I felt compelled to make good on my recent tweet by providing proper visual aid. To be fair, the photograph makes no effort to establish the owner relationship between the two subjects, but as I tweeted, it’s darn cute. … though I wish people made a better effort to smile back in the day. [caption id=“attachment_592” align=“aligncenter” width=“500” caption=“Rachmaninoff and a Dog (senar.
